statements: SELECT * FROM student_progress WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, progress_percentage FROM student_progress WHERE module_name = 'Math';
SELECT DISTINCT app_name FROM student_progress;
SELECT * FROM student_progress ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC;
SELECT student_id, module_name, progress_percentage FROM student_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT * FROM student_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 50 ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, app_name FROM student_progress WHERE module_name = 'Math' ORDER BY progress_percentage ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT app_name FROM student_progress WHERE student_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY app_name;
SELECT student_id, module_name, progress_percentage FROM student_progress WHERE app_name LIKE '%Science%' ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC;
SELECT COUNT(student_id) AS total_students, AVG(progress_percentage) AS avg_progress FROM student_progress GROUP BY app_name HAVING avg_progress > 70;
SELECT * FROM student_progress;
SELECT student_id, module_id, progress_status FROM student_progress WHERE progress_status = 'completed';
SELECT app_name, app_rating FROM ar_educational_apps WHERE app_rating > 4.5;
SELECT app_name, app_description FROM ar_educational_apps WHERE app_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM student_progress WHERE student_id = 101 ORDER BY module_id ASC, progress_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_progress WHERE progress_status = 'Completed';
SELECT student_id, module_id FROM student_progress WHERE progress_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT student_id, module_id, progress_status FROM student_progress WHERE student_id = 123 ORDER BY module_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ar_educational_apps WHERE app_rating > 4.5 ORDER BY app_name ASC;
SELECT app_name, app_description, app_rating FROM ar_educational_apps WHERE app_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM student_progress;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students ORDER BY student_grade DESC;
SELECT student_name, app_name FROM students s, augmented_reality_apps a WHERE s.student_id = a.app_id;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students WHERE student_grade >= 80;
SELECT student_name, app_name, app_rating FROM students s INNER JOIN augmented_reality_apps a ON s.student_id = a.app_id;
SELECT * FROM student_progress WHERE progress > 50 ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_grade, student_email FROM students WHERE student_grade = 12 LIMIT 10;

SELECT student_name, app_name, app_rating FROM students JOIN student_progress ON students.student_id = student_progress.student_id JOIN augmented_reality_apps ON student_progress.app_id = augmented_reality_apps.app_id;
SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_apps WHERE app_rating >= 4.5 ORDER BY app_name ASC, app_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(student_id) AS total_students, AVG(progress) AS avg_progress FROM student_progress;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, progress_percentage FROM Students ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_id=1;
SELECT student_name, course_name, progress_percentage FROM Students s JOIN ProgressHistory ph ON s.student_id = ph.student_id WHERE ph.progress_percentage >= 80;
SELECT student_name, course_name, progress_date FROM Students s JOIN ProgressHistory ph ON s.student_id = ph.student_id WHERE progress_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, progress_percentage FROM Students WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_description LIKE '%beginner%';

SELECT enrollment_id, student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM Enrollments INNER JOIN Students ON Enrollments.student_id = Students.student_id INNER JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT student_id, course_id, progress_date FROM ProgressHistory WHERE progress_percentage < 100 ORDER BY progress_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE semester='Spring';
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE instructor='John Doe';
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students JOIN submissions ON students.student_id = submissions.student_id ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, instructor, semester FROM courses WHERE semester = 'Fall';
SELECT student_id, grade FROM submissions WHERE grade > 90;
SELECT course_name, COUNT(*) AS num_assignments FROM courses INNER JOIN assignments ON courses.course_id = assignments.course_id GROUP BY course_name;
SELECT activity_name, description FROM ar_activities WHERE required_course = 1 ORDER BY activity_name DESC;
